+-------------------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| |fig1| Save model                   | |fig2| Load model                   |
+-------------------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| |fig3| Load topography anomaly      | |fig4| Load gravity anomaly         |
+-------------------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| |fig5| Load magnetic anomaly        | |fig6| Capture Coordinates          |
+-------------------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| |fig7| Start fault picking          | |fig8| Increase aspect x2           |
+-------------------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| |fig9| Decrease aspect x2           | |fig10| Increase aspect             |
+-------------------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| |fig11| Decrease aspect             | |fig12| Zoom in                     |
+-------------------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| |fig13| Zoom out                    | |fig14| Full extent                 |
+-------------------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| |fig15| Pan                         | |fig16| Segy gain down              |
+-------------------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| |fig17| Segy gain up                | |fig18| Layer transparency decrease |
+-------------------------------------+-------------------------------------+
| |fig19| Layer transparency increase | |fig20| Load well data              |
+-------------------------------------+-------------------------------------+
